SELECT FREE_BOARD_SEQ, FREE_BOARD_TITLE, FREE_BOARD_CONTENT, USER_ID, FREE_BOARD_STAT, REG_DT, UPDATE_DT, FREE_BOARD_VIEWS, USER_NAME, EMAIL, -- 댓글 수 추가 (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FREE_BOARD_COMMENT C WHERE C.FREE_BOARD_SEQ = A.FREE_BOARD_SEQ AND FREE_BOARD_CMT_STAT = 'Y') AS COMMENT_COUNT FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, FREE_BOARD_SEQ, FREE_BOARD_TITLE, FREE_BOARD_CONTENT, USER_ID, FREE_BOARD_STAT, REG_DT, UPDATE_DT, FREE_BOARD_VIEWS, USER_NAME, EMAIL FROM (SELECT A.FREE_BOARD_SEQ FREE_BOARD_SEQ, NVL(A.FREE_BOARD_TITLE, '') FREE_BOARD_TITLE, NVL(A.FREE_BOARD_CONTENT, '') FREE_BOARD_CONTENT, A.USER_ID USER_ID, NVL(A.FREE_BOARD_STAT, 'Y') FREE_BOARD_STAT, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.REG_DT,'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') REG_DT, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.UPDATE_DT, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') UPDATE_DT, NVL(A.FREE_BOARD_VIEWS, 0) FREE_BOARD_VIEWS, NVL(B.USER_NAME, '') USER_NAME, NVL(B.EMAIL, '') EMAIL FROM FREE_BOARD A, SB_USER B WHERE A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID
AND A.FREE_BOARD_STAT != 'N'
AND B.USER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND A.FREE_BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND DBMS_LOB.INSTR(A.FREE_BOARD_CONTENT, #{searchValue}) > 0
AND ( A.FREE_BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' OR DBMS_LOB.INSTR(A.FREE_BOARD_CONTENT, #{searchValue}) > 0 )
ORDER BY A.FREE_BOARD_SEQ DESC) ) A WHERE RNUM >= #{startRow} AND RNUM <= #{endRow}

SELECT COUNT(A.FREE_BOARD_SEQ) CNT FROM FREE_BOARD A, SB_USER B WHERE A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID
AND B.USER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND A.FREE_BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND DBMS_LOB.INSTR(A.FREE_BOARD_CONTENT, #{searchValue}) > 0
AND ( A.FREE_BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' OR DBMS_LOB.INSTR(A.FREE_BOARD_CONTENT, #{searchValue}) > 0 )

SELECT A.FREE_BOARD_SEQ FREE_BOARD_SEQ, NVL(A.FREE_BOARD_TITLE, '') FREE_BOARD_TITLE, NVL(A.FREE_BOARD_CONTENT, '') FREE_BOARD_CONTENT, A.USER_ID USER_ID, NVL(A.FREE_BOARD_STAT, '') FREE_BOARD_STAT, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.REG_DT, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') REG_DT, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.UPDATE_DT,'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') UPDATE_DT, NVL(A.FREE_BOARD_VIEWS, '') FREE_BOARD_VIEWS, NVL(B.USER_NAME, '') USER_NAME, NVL(B.EMAIL, '') EMAIL FROM FREE_BOARD A, SB_USER B WHERE A.FREE_BOARD_SEQ = #{value} AND A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID

mapper.select: SELECT A.FREE_BOARD_CMT_SEQ, A.FREE_BOARD_SEQ, A.USER_ID, NVL(A.FREE_BOARD_CMT_CONTENT, '') FREE_BOARD_CMT_CONTENT, NVL(A.PARENT_CMT_SEQ, 0) PARENT_CMT_SEQ, NVL(A.FREE_BOARD_CMT_STAT, 'Y') FREE_BOARD_CMT_STAT, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.CREATE_DT, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') CREATE_DT, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.UPDATE_DT, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') UPDATE_DT, NVL(A.DEPTH, 0) DEPTH, NVL(A.GROUP_SEQ, 0) GROUP_SEQ, NVL(A.ORDER_NO, 0) ORDER_NO, NVL(B.USER_NAME, 0) USER_NAME FROM FREE_BOARD_COMMENT A, SB_USER B WHERE A.FREE_BOARD_SEQ = #{value} AND A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID ORDER BY GROUP_SEQ DESC, ORDER_NO ASC

SELECT SEQ_FREE_BOARD_COMMENT_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO FREE_BOARD_COMMENT ( FREE_BOARD_CMT_SEQ, FREE_BOARD_SEQ, USER_ID, FREE_BOARD_CMT_CONTENT, PARENT_CMT_SEQ, FREE_BOARD_CMT_STAT, CREATE_DT, UPDATE_DT, DEPTH, GROUP_SEQ, ORDER_NO ) VALUES ( #{freeBoardCmtSeq}, #{freeBoardSeq}, #{userId}, #{freeBoardCmtContent}, #{parentCmtSeq}, #{freeBoardCmtStat}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{depth}, #{groupSeq}, #{orderNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT A.FREE_BOARD_CMT_SEQ, A.FREE_BOARD_SEQ, A.USER_ID, NVL(A.FREE_BOARD_CMT_CONTENT, '') FREE_BOARD_CMT_CONTENT, NVL(A.PARENT_CMT_SEQ, 0) PARENT_CMT_SEQ, NVL(A.FREE_BOARD_CMT_STAT, 'Y') FREE_BOARD_CMT_STAT, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.CREATE_DT, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') CREATE_DT, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.UPDATE_DT, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') UPDATE_DT, NVL(A.DEPTH, 0) DEPTH, NVL(A.GROUP_SEQ, 0) GROUP_SEQ, NVL(A.ORDER_NO, 0) ORDER_NO, NVL(B.USER_NAME, 0) USER_NAME FROM FREE_BOARD_COMMENT A, SB_USER B WHERE A.FREE_BOARD_CMT_SEQ = #{value} AND A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID
SELECT COUNT(FREE_BOARD_SEQ) CNT FROM FREE_BOARD_COMMENT WHERE FREE_BOARD_SEQ = #{value} AND FREE_BOARD_CMT_STAT = 'Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE FREE_BOARD SET FREE_BOARD_TITLE = #{freeBoardTitle}, FREE_BOARD_CONTENT = #{freeBoardContent}, UPDATE_DT = SYSDATE WHERE FREE_BOARD_SEQ = #{freeBoardSeq}
UPDATE FREE_BOARD_COMMENT SET FREE_BOARD_CMT_CONTENT = #{freeBoardCmtContent}, UPDATE_DT = SYSDATE WHERE FREE_BOARD_CMT_SEQ = #{freeBoardCmtSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT A.FREE_BOARD_SEQ FREE_BOARD_SEQ, NVL(A.FREE_BOARD_TITLE, '') FREE_BOARD_TITLE, NVL(A.FREE_BOARD_CONTENT, '') FREE_BOARD_CONTENT, A.USER_ID USER_ID, NVL(A.FREE_BOARD_STAT, 'Y') FREE_BOARD_STAT, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.REG_DT,'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') REG_DT, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.UPDATE_DT, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') UPDATE_DT, NVL(A.FREE_BOARD_VIEWS, 0) FREE_BOARD_VIEWS, NVL(B.USER_NAME, '') USER_NAME, NVL(B.EMAIL, '') EMAIL, (SELECT COUNT(C.FREE_BOARD_CMT_SEQ) FROM FREE_BOARD_COMMENT C WHERE C.FREE_BOARD_SEQ = A.FREE_BOARD_SEQ AND FREE_BOARD_CMT_STAT = 'Y') AS COMMENT_COUNT FROM FREE_BOARD A, SB_USER B WHERE A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID AND A.USER_ID = #{userId} AND A.FREE_BOARD_STAT = 'Y' ORDER BY A.FREE_BOARD_SEQ DESC
